name: Glow Block Puzzle Game
description:
Let’s enjoy a simple and addictive classic block puzzle game! The goal is to drag and drop blocks in order to create and destroy full lines on the grid table both vertically and horizontally. If there is no position for the given block on the screen, the game will end. Don't forget to keep space for the blocks from filling the screen.

How to play:
-Drag the GLOW blocks to move them
-Try to fit them all in the row or column
-Don't worry, no time limits
-Game will be over if there are no room to drag.
